website_summaries.verdict: A net that provides you a way to secure the posts to the pool edges to create a sturdy set-up.
pros: Pool volleyball is one of the more social sports where  kids and adults alike can participate
Sturdy enough to withstand spikes from the former high school standout
cons: We would expect more in the way of accessories

customer_reviews.title: reliable mounting without drilling holes
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a net that was easy to use without having to drill holes in my pool. The clamp mounts are a bit bulky but work perfectly. I tied the net on and taped the ends, which lets me pull one post our and put it on the side when not in use, and then I just snap it back in when we want to play. My pool is 18' round, net fits by using a little bit of the extra slack. You could probably go up to a 21' pool without issues, not sure about much bigger than that.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: ... opening of my new inground pool and set this bad boy up
customer_reviews.text: Just had the grand opening of my new inground pool and set this bad boy up. The first time the ball made contact with this bad boy, the entire contraption fell apart and my Mother in Law laughed at me for 15 to 20 minutes! The yellow included ball had a leak before it was ever used. I feel as if I was ripped off! You will love this, if you love garbage! P.S.- The material is thinner than dental floss.
customer_reviews.author: jeff jerde

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: Real reviewer here, this thing is garbage. Unless the top of your pool is 100% completely flat which nearly NO POOLS are, the mounting system for this net will not stay clamped to the top of your ledge regardless of the amount of herculean force you use to clamp it down,... it will simply slide off. dont waste your money on this chinese-made garbage, keep looking elsewhere for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: David Tullio

customer_reviews.title: Great for above ground pool.
customer_reviews.text: Seems very sturdy. Did not want to put holes in railing. Very easy to install and setup. Had a blast this last summer!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Kinda janky
customer_reviews.text: When I got the package there were assembly pieces missing and the legs that held it on the side of the pool were too bulky to fit with my deck so we just tied it to our deck posts. The net snapped on the corner part where the net ends and the tie string is connected to it. Only got to play with it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed poll and net
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and screwed onto metal coping very easily. Only problem with the pats were the caps that push into the tops of the main polls; they did not fit
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wardlow

customer_reviews.title: Pool volleyball saves the weekend
customer_reviews.text: Worked just like it said it would! Just wish the hardware was stainless steel so it won’t rust in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Perilla

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase we ever made for our pool. The net has survived hours of use by us and four overzealous teenage boys and is holding up just fine. The ball that comes with it is sub-par, but you can buy some nice Mikasa soft volleyballs at Walmart for under $10.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived missing parts. Had to go to local hardware store to buy missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Bmace0575

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Most of the parts were missing including the net and connection pieces. Still working with poolmaster to try and get all the missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Messinger

customer_reviews.title: Clamp on volleyball net for above ground pools
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my above ground pool. It’s easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Fun Time
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I can't tell you how much my family enjoyed this. This product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda I Roman

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Pool Volleyball Net
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15X30 oval pool and wanted to also play volleyball in the pool. This product is a little flimsy and my husband has had to make a few adjustments to get it to stay up and adjust across the pool.
customer_reviews.author: tlc

customer_reviews.title: poolside volley
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Pool Volleyball, this was exactly what we were looking for and has provided alot of fun for the entire family. Well receive, good quality and timely.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Very poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I'll be surprised if this net last more than a week. It's so cheaply made, it should not be worth more than 10 dollars and I'm not exaggerating.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: net held up for 3 weeks, and a total ...
customer_reviews.text: net held up for 3 weeks, and a total of 6 games and the netting close to the middle frayed away, and 1 side started fraying away at the seam, had to call Poolmaster, waiting on replacement
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Poolmaster 72786 Above-Ground Mounted Poolside Volleyball / Badminton Game with Bracket Mounts,White/White,16W ft. x 2.5H in.
product_meta.description:
Bring your best game to the pool with Poolmaster's Above-Ground Mounted Poolside Volleyball / Badminton Game. The volleyball net measures 16' long with 10' side ties for extended length. The bracket mounts attach to a 4” wide or larger top rail and can be repositioned as needed. The set includes game posts and an all-weather game ball with inflating needle as well as four badminton rackets and birdies.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Since 1958, Poolmaster has been a leading manufacturer of aftermarket pool and spa products with an unwavering commitment to quality, service and reliability. Poolmaster offers products across six different product lines- Backyard and Decor, Inflatables, Floats, Maintenance, Swim and Dive, and Toys and Games. Poolmaster - We Make Water Fun!
feature_bullets: Specially designed volleyball and badminton action for above-ground pools
Combination game set includes 16' volleyball game net with 10' side ties, upright poles, and bracket mounts for attaching to 4" or wider top rails
Bracket mounts are portable and repositionable
Deluxe vinyl game ball included with inflating needle
Combination game set includes set of four badminton rackets with four birdies

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
